New Records: Ismaila Sarr converted a late penalty to secure Senegal's victory over Burundi
Key Match Events: Ismaila Sarr scored the winning penalty in the 71st minute
Pre-Game Insights: Senegal were desperate for a win after drawing against Burkina Faso
Burundi had a strong start in their qualifying campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: Starting lineups for both teams were provided
The match was a qualifier for AFCON 2025
